abstract: Lisa Edelstein, along with Nina Arianda and Dallas Roberts, show up this week on "The  Good Wife," but is the show on slow boil?
snippet: Lisa Edelstein, along with Nina Arianda and Dallas Roberts, show up this week on "The  Good Wife," but is the show on slow boil?

headline.main: 'Good Wife' Watch: The Return of Cuddy, Er, Lisa Edelstein
